name: Russ & Daughters
address: 179 E Houston St, New York, NY 10002, USA

reviews.text: Enjoy! :)
ร้านสะอาด มีของขายหลากหลายมาก ไม่ถูกใจเท่าไหร่ แซลมอนและคาเวียครีมชีส ทำให้ท้องของเราทั้ง2คนปั่นป่วน

Got a poppy seed bagel with lox and scallion cream cheese (also had onion, tomato, and capers).

This was my favorite bagel on the trip and the reason was mainly the cream cheese. It was so light and mild tasting i felt like I could eat a tub of it ans feel fine. The lox was also amazing too though. The sandwitch was just perfectly executed.

I wish the in store experience was a little better though. The store become a mess when it gets crowded so plan to go at a slightly odd time for a smoother/faster experience.
Bagel itself was good not great.  Probably better places with less wait in the city.
Excellents bagels sur mesure !⭐️⭐️⭐️
I didn’t want to like it, given how long the wait can be, but the cream cheese and lox are fantastic

Russ and Daughters is an institution in NYC, and it isn't really a bagel shop more of a deli...An excellent selection of sandwiches and bagels. I have to say that the cream cheese was some of the best l've ever had. The bagel was good not mind blowing, l've had way better in the city. Be ready to wait a while, especially on weekends, but you can take a number and kill time elsewhere. We went to Katz ate and still had to wait for our number to be called when we got back. Lol! 100% recommend!

재료가 신선해요. 유명맛집 답게 줄이 길어요. 번호표뽑고 안에서 기다리면 불러줍니다. 배이글 하나 가격이 2.5만원이라 후덜덜입니다.
먹기 좋게 반 잘라주셨네요. 매장에서 먹을 공간이 없어서 근처 놀이터에서 먹었는데 여기서 베이글 많이 드시네요. ㅋㅋㅋ
Bagels were generall good but overhyped and pricey.
A legendary, must-go deli in Manhattan! Always exceptional products.

Love this place. Lifelong customer. I don’t even eat fish, and it’s one of the happiest places on earth for me. On my last visit they made my sandwich tailored exactly how I wanted, and — get this — it promptly fell on E. Houston. The whole sandwich. They know me for years, so knew I was being sincere, and remade the whole thing.
Must try their chocolate babka.
日本から来ました。デカい！美味しい！ベーグルって美味しいんだな、でも大きい！これがニューヨークのベーグルか、食べてみたかったんです。
Zanimljivi sendviči ali ne preporučujem vracanje
Great service and suggestions to get the best bagel possible!!

知り合いに教えてもらい行ってみました。
すぐ近くにカッツデリカテッセンがありますが、こちらの方が空いてるし個人的には美味しかったです。
ベーグルの種類と中身を選んでオーダー。
ある程度の組み合わせはメニューにありますが、トッピングなども出来SUBWAYみたいな感じ。
Tシャツ、バック、ピクルス、キャビアなどお土産になりそうなものも売ってます。
ベーグルはやや硬め、メニューによりますが生のサーモンと周りだけ燻製したサーモン＋クリームチーズの相性は間違いない。
イートインスペースが無いので路上や近くの公園で。持ち帰りの地元民も多くこちらはすごくオススメのお店。

Russ & Daughters is a really solid spot—bagels and smoked fish are tasty, and the spreads are top-notch. Service is friendly, though it can get crowded and a bit hectic at times. Not perfect, but still a classic NYC spot worth visiting.
Cute shop, great bagels, staff very helpful, can get a perfect little unique  souvenir and the best selection of smoked fish!
The best meal I’ve had all year. Everything tasted fresh and homemade. Outstanding service as well.
Tenía algo de impresión de comer en salmón asi pero realmente exquisito! Un manjar, caro pero manjar
Not bad
Phenomenal food.
Friendly staff joking around with the customers, good food, good vibe
Great Bagel sandwiches! Try the smoked salmon and salmon roe!
Something is special about their bagels
Se vuoi mangiare il vero bagel devi andare qui
El mejor bagel con salmón de New York City!!!
Bagels are fresh and lots of cream cheese flavors to chose from. They also have smoked fish and cavier. Dont forget to take a number when you walk in.
Such an amazing food. The bagel  was wonderful and there isn't enough words for the Bobbka cinnamon
Busy traditional bagel spot with impeccable seafood and friendly service.
Delicious, relaxed service style even with counter service. The guys were really nice and a provided great experience. I had an everything bagel, lox and caviar cream cheese. A manhattan staple!
A must have in NY
fav bagels in town
The best bagels & whitefish salad !
Good quality foods; lox smoked salmon without a plastic packaging is appreciated
The OG.

Stopped by Russ & Daughters and it’s easy to see why it’s such an iconic spot. The fish quality really stands out — fresh, flavorful, and generously portioned. You definitely get a lot for what you order, which makes it feel worthwhile. The classic bagels and spreads complement the fish perfectly, and the whole experience has a timeless, authentic New York feel. A must-visit for anyone who appreciates top-notch smoked fish and traditional deli vibes. We were able to eat right in front of the store, where there is a couple benches available.
I had the fancy delancey. Delicious. Get the wasabi fish roe on your bagel. Sensational. Loved the staff!
Delicious bagels, and very patient staff despite the constant onslaught of customers
Order online!!
What an awesome spot full of history! Although is usually busy, the number systems makes them move quickly. Don’t let a long line deter you from an amazing bagel.

There's a reason this place has been around for decades. The spot takes you back to an old pharmacy with counter ordering, all items beautifully on display, and no frills. Come prepared to order because in true NY fashion they move QUICK. The everything egg bagels are tasty but I felt the cream cheese stole the show. These are highly sought out by the locals and I can see why. They offer a variety of fish options but we didn't taste test these.
Amazing lox bagel, so many more options to choose from

Klasyk z serkiem i łososiem uważam za przereklamowany.
Bajgiel (bułka) jakby z dnia poprzedniego, suchy, papierowy. Bajgiel zabijał smak pozostałości. A może serka i łososia było za mało?
Generalnie całość dość smaczna. Ale ja na renomę miejsca bardzo słabo to wyszło.
Jadłem w 2 innych miejscach bajgle w NY. To było najsłabsze
Fish is fresh

Very good place to get a cream cheese bagel and they are generous. There is a ticket system when you enter and you have to grab a ticket to be served and service is pretty quick. It’s not the best I had as it’s maybe hyped up to be, but certainly very solid. Feels like a commercial lineup with the ticket system rather than personal old style bagel shop.
This place is out of this world! Just go and bring some time to enjoy every moment of it!
An easy 5 . Fresh bagel plenty of filling and very tasty . Remember to get a no as soon as you enter the shop . Of course there is a wait for quality like this

we stopped here cause my son wanted to try their bagels... the bagels are in the smaller size which is fine. i got the lox sandwich, with the tomatoes, capers, and onion... its really good. I liked how she sliced the lox thin. Its pricey, but that's NYC for ya.  it gets busy, so take a number and wait a while

Russ & Daughters doesn't need me to tell you that their smoked fish is delicious. They've been in business for over a hundred years. Tiny, crowded shop, but the wait for your order isn't unreasonable. They've taken orders like yours many times before, and they know what they're doing. The smoked salmon and herring are excellent. (The chopped herring isn't to my taste, but there are several other varieties of herring, and they're yummy.) Lots of varieties of cream cheese, too. The baked goods aren't quite as exciting.

상상했던 딱 그 맛이다
상상과 달랐던것은 재료의 신선함이다
훈제연어주제에 이렇게 후레시한 맛이라니..

뉴욕도 처음이고 연어들어간 베이글도 처음이어서 어떻게 고를지 몰랐다.
그래서  클래식한 베이글을 원하고 재료는 빼지말아달라고 했다. 고른건 크림치즈 종류와 베이글뿐이었고 맛있는 연어,케이퍼,양파를 차곡히 쌓아 포장해주셨다.

베이글은 다소 딱딱한 감이 있으나 질기진
않았다. 이것의 본토의 맛이겠거니 하며 뜨듯한 바루드커피외 맛있게먹었다

염장 생선을 전문으로 다루는 델리, 동시에 뉴욕에서 늘 최고로 거론되는 베이글 가게이기도 하다. 연어뿐 아니라 여러 염장 생선과 식료품을 베이글에 조합해 내는 걸로 유명하다.

앞서 방문한 뉴욕 3대 베이글집 중 하나인 에싸 베이글보다 50년 앞선 1914년에 개업했다. 카츠 델리카트슨에서 도보로 1분 거리의 본점을 찾았고 뉴욕에 지점 세 곳을 더 두고 있다.

매장에 들어서면 정육점스러운 기다란 진열장이 나오고 철갑상어, 캐비아 등 생선 관련 식재료가 다 모여있어 눈을 확 사로잡는다. 베이글 재료로만 쓰고 있지 않아 따로 구매도 된다.

주워들은 바에 의하면 베이글은 직접 안 만들고 납품을 받는다던데 그래서인지 베이글 작업실이 보이지 않았다. 어쨌거나 베이글 종류는 절대 적은 편이라 볼 수 없을 만큼 다양하다.

크림치즈 셀렉션은 다양한 걸 넘어 모든 게 독특한데 캐비아 크림치즈 같은 여태 보도 듣도 못한 것들이 수두룩 빽빽했다. 다만 하이엔드급 크림치즈인지라 가격이 꽤 비싼 편이다.

전형적인 훈제 연어 베이글이 아닌 색다른 도전을 하고 싶어 날치알과 참치가 들어간 베이글을 주문해 봤다. 날치알의 경우 와사비에다 버무린 게 특징이라 초록빛을 띠고 있었다.

아메리카노 한 잔과 팁까지 해서 가격은 얼추 에싸 베이글과 비슷하게 나왔다. 한화로 약 3만 원에 육박한 베이글로 매장 근처에 벤치에 초라하게 앉아 반 조각만 서둘러 먹어봤다.

먼저 구성을 살펴보면 홀스래디시 크림치즈를 베이글에 옅게 깔고 그 위 참치와 날치알을 올린 게 전부다. 양보단 재료 하나하나의 품질로 승부를 보는듯했고 실제로 그런 맛이었다.

상큼한 크림치즈와 톡톡 터지는 알싸한 날치알 그리고 고소하고 짭짤한 참치까지 모두 각각의 색이 명확했다. 익숙한 맛이면서도 좋은 식재료만의 깊은 풍미가 더해져 있어 남달랐다.

PS. 투 고, 테이크 아웃만 가능

직원이 친절한 편이고, 음식이 맛있습니다.
특히 mixed olives는 매콤하여 potato latkes와 아주 잘 어울립니다.
베이글 schmear(= only cream cheese)로 garlig bagle+skallion cream cheese를 선택해서 먹었는데 맛있었습니다.

맛있고, 계속 생각나서 다시 방문했습니다.
mixed olive♡♡

로바(염장 연어) 특유의 쿰쿰한 짠내가 살아있는 집임니다. 입구부터 무척이나 오래된 정취를 풍기는데, 실내는 완전 놀이동산 같아요. 물론 어린 아이들은 섣불리 좋아하기 힘든 쿰쿰한 내음이 나지만요. 순번표 뽑고 기다렸다 한명씩 주문하면 됩니다. 베이글은 쫀득하고 언어는 짭짤해요. 크림치즈는 적당히 느끼하면서 고소하고요. 케이퍼와 양파가 적당한 새콤함을
줍니다. 여러모로 맛있어요.

한국에서 먹던 베이글과는 조금 다르게 질기고, 제대로 된 식사빵이니, 간식보다는 식사로 드세요.

비오는 날 기다림없이

연어베이글 맛 봄
상대적으로 덜 짜다
맛있다
직원분 친절하시고

ess-a 가 3대에서 빠지고 이젠 여기가 오랜전통과 스토리를 무기?로 한국인에게 노출되는 중인듯

카츠델리  옆에 있어서
그래도 온 김에 궁금함으로 가 봄

여기까지 4군데 앞으로도 한두군데 더 들리겠으나 그냥 자기 만족으로 먹으면 된다는 생각이 들었음

우열이라기 보다는 각자의 개성이구나 그리고 내 입맛에 맞는게 그리고 크게 나쁘고 너무 좋고 그렇다기 보다는

먹으면서 그런 생각이 듬
이렇게 맛있는 연어는 처음이에요. 모든 직원들이 친절하고 음식을 만드는 공간, 재료가 보관되어 있는 곳이 청결합니다. 매우 만족스러운 식사였어요. 위장이 작아서 남편이랑 한개 나눠먹었는데 그 부분이 아쉬웠어요. 두개 시킬걸..
즐겁게 테이크 아웃해서왔는데 ㅎㅎ 친구가 연어가 넘 적은거 아니냐고.. 가격대비 좀 많이 부실하네요 ㅎ

인기 많은 베이글 가게입니다. 줄을 서게되면 번호표를 뽑아야합니다. 번호를 부르면 가서 주문하면 됩니다. 베이글 빵 종류를 고를 수 있고 안에 들어가는 재료를 고를 수 있습니다. 또한 커피도 구매할 수 있습니다. 한국인은 아침에도 주로 국물이 있는 요리를 먹어서 베이글 아침식사가 어색하긴 하지만 미국의 문화를 체험하고 싶다면 이 베이글 가게를 추천합니다. 직원들은 친절하고 베이글은 씹을수록 고소하고 맛있습니다.

염장 생선 같은게 유명한 식료품점이에요.  클래식 샌드위치로 시켰는데 Gaspe Nova Salmon이라는 훈제연어도 매우 짭짤한 편이에요. 근데 연어를 매우 넉넉하게 넣어주다보니 짤 수 있어요. 케이퍼도 짜니까 절대 추가하지 마시고 토마토나 어니언 등을 추가해주세요. 옛날에 보기로 여기 베이글 유대인식으로 만든 베이글을 납품 받는다고 하는데 쫄깃 담백합니다. 아 부드럽지는 않음~

워낙 유명하다고 해서 갔는데
맛도 있었음.
연어베이글 싫어하는데도 맛있었음
근데 좀 비싸요
코로나 시국인데도 웨이팅 해야합니다. 전화번호(한국전화번호도 가능)를 남겨 놓으면 입장 가능할때 문자가 옵니다. 30분정도 기다렸고요. 오랜만에 먹는 lox라서 그런지 맛있게 먹었습니다. 직원들도 친절했고요.

화려한 맛은 아닌데 지금도 생각나네요
연어 수준이 미쳤습니다 생연어 수준이에요

아주 맛있는 베이글이었습니다

영어 못하는데도 웃으며 기다려줌. 진짜 존맛탱. 숙소가 근처라서 두번먹음. 여러 조합으로 시켜봤는데 결국 기본이 맛있었음. 연어 gaspe nova만 바꾸지 말고 나머지 조합은 취향껏 먹으면 됨. 블로그 검색해보면 알겠지만, 다른 연어는 상급자 코스임.
plain bagel + plain cream cheese + gaspe nova + tomato

전통방식을 고수하는 집으로 제가 방문했을때도 사람이 정말 많았구요 정말 신기해보이는 걸 많이 판매하고 있었습니다.
그런데 전통방식이라 ㅎㅎㅎ 맛이.... 베이글이 엄청 찔겼어요
수준높은 식재료라는데 제 입이 저렴한 맛을 좋아하나봐요
그래도 경험해 본 것으로 만족 !!

웨이팅 40분정도 했어요
플레인베이글+스칼리온크림치즈+가스페노바+어니언+토마토=jmt
이거 사들고 주변 스벅에서 커피 마시면서 먹었어요
진짜 연어의 맛이 차원이 달라요. 뉴욕서 먹은 연어베이글 중 여기가 최고입니다. 연어 꼭 드세요.

오랜만에 뉴질랜드 연어 ㅋㅋㅋ
역시 연어는 뉴질랜드가 맛나 ^^
1년만에 다시 왔는데 번호표 생겼네 ㅋㅋㅋ
오늘도 뉴질연어 ㅋㅋㅋ
에싸,브루클린 베이글 먹고 여기도 먹어봤는데 개인적으로 러스-브루클린-에싸 순으로 맛있는것 같습니다. 쫄깃한 베이글 좋아하면 에싸 부드러운 베이글 좋아하면 브루클린,러스 가시는게 좋을듯!! 러스는 근데 큐알코드로 주문하면 베이글 토스트 안해주는것 같았는데 못본건지.. 왠만하면 번호표 뽑고 주문하시는게

현지인들도 많은거같았고 아시안은 저뿐이었어요
번호표 뽑고 많이는 아니고 조금 기다려야했어요.
진열된 식자재들만 봐도 뭔가 내공이 느껴지는 느낌 다른 유명한 베이글집은 안먹어봐서 비교는 힘들지만 맛있었어요.

양파랑 토마토 케이퍼는 추가해야 넣어주는거같아요
베이글만 파는게 아니라 유대인 음식 식재료 같이 팔아서 그런가 연휴 때 가면 미어터짐ㅜㅜ 1시간 넘게 기다렸는데 음..그정도 기다릴 가치는 없어요..ㅋㅋㅋㅋㅋ

연어퀄리티가 아마도 뉴욕 넘버원일듯?
정말 맛있는 베이글.

개맛있음 .. 픽*, 에ㅆ••• 뉴욕에서유명한 베이글 집 다 돌아다녔는데 단연코 1등
연어 베이글 맛도리 개미쳤음
오래된 식료품점.. 베이글 맛도 일품. 이것 저것 추가 하다가는 양이 엄청 많아짐

인생연어

2025.08訪問
噂のベーグルを食べにきました！
初訪問と伝えたら店員さんがおすすめしてくれたサーモンのベーグルと酢漬けヨーグルトのお魚をチョイス。

テイクアウトで近くのベンチで早速いただきました。
ベーグルも程よくモチモチでサーモンの塩味もちょうど良くとても美味しかったです。
1番のヒットは酢漬けかも。
また訪れたいお店でした。

Pro tip: when you walk in, be sure to take a number—they’ll call it out when it’s your turn to order. The place has a charming old-school interior that gives off classic New York vibes, which adds to the experience.

They offer a variety of sandwiches, bagels, spreads, and smoked fish options. I ordered a salmon bagel with a few extras and ended up paying around $20. While the atmosphere was cool, the bagel itself was quite small and didn’t justify the high price—especially since we've had better, more satisfying salmon bagels elsewhere in NYC for less.

Overall, I wouldn't recommend it, and I wouldn’t go back—there are better bagel spots in the city that offer more value and flavor.

My brother was told about this place. Absolutely loved it. Felt like a slip back in time and you can tell this place is not only, take care of and respected, but also has quality staff that put love and attention to your order. We split the classic bagel and lox. Best bagel I have ever had in my life. I truly wish I could eat this everyday. 10/10

The best bagel I had in NYC. Soft and chewy toasted bagels, freshly sliced gravlax lox, scallion cream cheese with capers, onions and tomatoes. Is there anything more quintessential bagel-ly than that??

Take a ticket when you enter and listen closely for them to call your number. Even when there's a lot of people in the store, the line moves fast.

ニューヨークでマイベストのベーグル店です！ここの「Classic Bagel」は本当に美味しい。もともと魚の塩漬けを専門としているお店らしく、スモークサーモンの味が抜群です。さらにスキャリオンクリームチーズとの組み合わせが最高！
ベーグル自体も他店と比べてモチモチで食べやすく、NYに3年住んでいますが、ここがベストベーグルだと感じました。これだけ美味しいと、他のメニューも試したくなります。
時間帯によっては混雑しますが、日曜の午前10時に訪れた際はスムーズに入店・注文できました。

My absolute favorite bagel shop in New York! Their “Classic Bagel” is absolutely delicious. The shop originally specialized in curing fish, so the flavor of their smoked salmon is outstanding. Paired with the scallion cream cheese, it’s simply perfect.
The bagels themselves are softer and chewier than many others in the city, making them very easy to eat. After living in NYC for three years, I can confidently say this is the best bagel I’ve had here. With how good this was, I definitely want to try their other menu items next time.
It can get very busy depending on the time of day, but when I went at 10 AM on a Sunday, I was able to get in and order without any wait.

Accompanying a friend, I arrived at Russ & Daughters at Thursday 11am. The establishment, albeit small, had already filled up with patrons. After taking a number and waiting for 15 minutes, I placed an order at the counter and watched a real-time assembly of the Daughter's Delight ($22) bagel sandwich. This consisted of smoked salmon, cream cheese, and salmon roe on an everything bagel.

This bagel single handedly set a new bar of expectations for a lox bagel. The salmon itself did not have the persistent, lingering fishy flavor of normal cold-smoked salmon. It proved denser in flavor as well. The cream cheese also tasted more savory and possessed a heft and gravitas (I hesitate to use the word heavy due to its negative connotation food-wise) that renders normal cream cheese disappointingly light and flavorless in comparison.

Lived in New York most of my life (currently in Vegas) and it it wasn’t until this very day at 40 years old did I try the famed Russ and daughters bagel.

Is it the best bagel?  No. But looking at it as a complete sandwich with all the fixings ordered as recommended.  Fantastic, one of, if not the best lox bagels I’ve had.  Shame I missed out for all these years.  I’m glad I had time meandering around Manhattan today

Get a number after coming in! The staff were moving pretty fast, whilst having good manners. I got a toasted poppyseed bagel with Nova, plain cream cheese, and capers. The bagel was pretty nice. The Nova was PERFECT!! It wasn’t too salty, and had a very clean taste to it. The texture was also very nice. You can feel some resistance when you bite down on the sliced Nova, and without and hard or chewy tendon parts. The caper added some saltiness to the whole bagel, and gave it more depth to the flavors. The cream cheese was also very nice. It had a slight sourness to it, and made the bagel even better.

I also got a chocolate babka, and it looked amazing! They also have other pastries, and sweets. I saw assorted dried fruits in the window. Rugelach, black and white cookies, and some other items. They also sell white fish, herrings, sturgeons, salmon roes, and caviar. I’d like to try their latkes, and kugels next time!

The staff were very knowledgeable, friendly, and patient. Highly recommended! Amazing place!! A true New York City gem!! I’d definitely looking forward to coming back again and try everything!

Edit: disappointed by their babka. Their babka tasted like the ones I got from WholeFoods or west side market.
Excellent bagels and smoked fish, well work the hype. Beautiful NY bagel generously filled in a shop with plenty of character and charm. Friendly service too
A bit pricey for a bagel but you get a high quality seafood! Freshly baked bagel buns too! We had the salmon and lox with cream cheese bagel which was reallllyyyy delicious!
Best smoked salmon bagel I've ever eaten. Many different options of sauce and fish. Lovely iconic NYC style interior. The place was crowded and was more suitable for take-away.

This vintage-style bagel totally stole my heart. The decor is elegant and nostalgic, like stepping into a beautifully preserved moment from the past. It’s clean, cozy, and filled with this lovely old-school charm. The staff were super friendly and made me feel really welcome. The selection of pastries isn’t huge, but that actually makes it feel even more special—like a thoughtful tribute to classic, timeless flavors.
It’s such a cute spot. Totally worth checking out if you’re nearby!

Extraordinary service, fish and bagels.  The vegan "cream cheese" and thinly sliced lox is to die for.  The gluten free everything bagel was also outstanding. Reports from my gluten and dairy  eating family were glowing.  Such an incredible treat. Russ and Daughters is a gourmet foodie treat.
